stories.tease: What do you do when your friends are sick of hearing about your breakup? Use a supercomputer to find a happier ending.
We tried to win the New Yorker Cartoon Caption Contest by making AI-generated captions.

author.name: Pamela Mishkin
author.bio: currently works on making algorithms less sinister. She also talks a lot about voting systems, Finnish architecture, and JoJo Siwa under various anagram-based aliases.
